news.title: What we know so far about the shooting
news.summary: Police say the victims, a young couple, were shot by a man who shouted "free, free Palestine".

news.title: UK net migration in 2024 almost halves to 431,000, ONS estimates
news.summary: The ONS says the yearly decline in net migration is the biggest numerical drop on record.

news.title: Violent criminals could be released early and chemical castration pilot expanded after review
news.summary: The landmark sentencing review calls for fewer custodial sentences and earlier prison releases.

news.title: 90 lorry loads of humanitarian aid now in Gaza after 3 day delay at crossing
news.summary: The aid, including flour and baby food, was picked up three days after Israel eased an 11-week-long blockade.

news.title: Nike to raise prices as firms face tariffs uncertainty
news.summary: The US sportswear giant says its price increases are part of "seasonal planning".

news.title: What Trump's choreographed Oval Office attack on Ramaphosa tells us
news.summary: The BBC's Gary O'Donoghue analyses how the South African president reacted in an extraordinary Oval Office meeting.

news.title: Watch: Deep inside a Norwegian mountain, Nato allies train for Arctic war
news.summary: Europe editor Katya Adler gains access to a secret HQ and Norwegian warships leading military exercises.

news.title: Tax rise warning after higher-than-expected government borrowing
news.summary: Borrowing - the difference between spending and tax income - was £20.2bn, up £1bn from April last year.

news.title: Gazans fear shutdown of water plants as Israel widens offensive
news.summary: Parents say children are having to drink unsafe and salty water, as fuel shortages threaten desalination and hygiene facilities.

news.title: Numbers are down - but Starmer will still struggle to win on immigration
news.summary: New figures show a fall in net migration. But still, Labour will struggle to soothe public concern, writes our senior correspondent Allan Little.
